attributes.action: Call a general election-Empty the barrel of rotten apples.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the only way of restoring the confidence of the electorate in the Government and the reputation of the House of Parliament will be to dissolve Parliament immediately – This will empty the barrel so that any rotten apples can be dealt with – Call a general election and require all standing MPs wishing to seek re-election to prove that they have complied totally with the ‘spirit’ and the ‘word’ of expenses and allowances rules!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
